name: Bubbles & Bonz
description:
Welcome to Bubbles and Bonz!!

Time to work together!

Grab an xbox controller and a teammate and work together using a single controller to control Bubbles and Bonz! 

One player uses the left side of the controller to control Bubbles, while the other uses the right side of the controller to control Bonz. Have fun holding hands and being connected like Bubbles and Bonz are!

Controls:
Left Joystick - Move Bubbles
Left Trigger - Bubbles Superjump
Left Bumper - Bubbles "Bump" Power
Right Joystick - Move Bonz
Left Trigger - Bonz Super jump
Right Bumper - Bonz "Bump" Power

Navigate through the belly of the beast and avoid the danger zones together and see how long you can last!
